frontmatter.description: Embarking on thrilling adventures across diverse landscapes, from conquering mountain peaks on a motorbike to exploring pristine island beaches, our shared travel experiences forged unforgettable bonds.
frontmatter.title: Creating Lifelong Memories: Bonds and Adventures of a Lifetime at NUS
